thread.title: Stephen King wraps up crime fiction series
thread.title_full: Stephen King wraps up crime fiction series

title: Stephen King wraps up crime fiction series
text:
> Entertainment Stephen King wraps up crime fiction series FILE - In this Nov. 13, 2013 file photo, author Stephen King poses for the cameras, during a promotional tour for his novel, "Doctor Sleep" in Paris. King’s “End of Watch” will be published next June, Scribner announced Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. The novel is the third, after “Mr. Mercedes” and “Finders Keepers,” to feature retired police detective Bill Hodges. (AP Photo/Francois Mori, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
